Sports.question: Which country has won the most Olympic medals overall?
Sports.explanation: The USA has won the most Olympic medals in history.

Sports.question: Which football club is known as 'The Red Devils'?
Sports.explanation: Manchester United is nicknamed 'The Red Devils'.

Sports.question: Which city hosted the first modern Olympic Games?
Sports.explanation: Athens hosted the first modern Olympic Games in 1896.

Sports.question: Which country won the ICC Cricket World Cup in 2011?
Sports.explanation: India won the ICC Cricket World Cup in 2011.

Sports.question: Which Indian cricketer is known as the 'God of Cricket'?
Sports.explanation: Sachin Tendulkar is widely regarded as the 'God of Cricket'.

Sports.question: Which tennis player has won the most Grand Slam titles?
Sports.explanation: Novak Djokovic holds the record for most Grand Slam titles.

Sports.question: Which country hosted the 2022 FIFA World Cup?
Sports.explanation: Qatar hosted the FIFA World Cup in 2022.

Sports.question: Who is known as the fastest man in the world?
Sports.explanation: Usain Bolt holds the world record for the 100m sprint.

Literature.question: Who wrote 'War and Peace'?
Literature.explanation: 'War and Peace' was written by Leo Tolstoy.

Literature.question: Who is the author of 'The Catcher in the Rye'?
Literature.explanation: J.D. Salinger wrote 'The Catcher in the Rye'.

Literature.question: Who wrote 'The Odyssey'?
Literature.explanation: 'The Odyssey' is an epic poem written by Homer.

Literature.question: Who is the author of 'Animal Farm'?
Who wrote 'The Great Gatsby'?
Literature.explanation: 'The Great Gatsby' was written by F. Scott Fitzgerald.

Literature.question: Who is the author of '1984'?
Literature.explanation: George Orwell wrote the dystopian novel '1984'.

Literature.question: Who wrote 'To Kill a Mockingbird'?
Literature.explanation: Harper Lee wrote 'To Kill a Mockingbird'.

Literature.question: Which book series features the character Harry Potter?
Literature.explanation: Harry Potter is the main character in the 'Harry Potter' series by J.K. Rowling.

Current Affairs.question: Which country recently joined the European Union in 2025?
Current Affairs.explanation: Ukraine joined the European Union in 2025.

Current Affairs.question: Who is the current UN Secretary-General?
Current Affairs.explanation: António Guterres is the current UN Secretary-General.

Current Affairs.question: Who is the current Prime Minister of Canada?
Current Affairs.explanation: Justin Trudeau is the current Prime Minister of Canada.

Current Affairs.question: Which country won the FIFA Women's World Cup in 2023?
Current Affairs.explanation: Spain won the FIFA Women's World Cup in 2023.

Current Affairs.question: Who is the current President of the United States?
Current Affairs.explanation: Joe Biden is the current President of the United States (as of 2025).

Current Affairs.question: Which country hosted the 2024 Summer Olympics?
Current Affairs.explanation: France hosted the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris.

Current Affairs.question: Which country launched the Artemis mission to the Moon?
Current Affairs.explanation: The USA launched the Artemis mission to the Moon.

Current Affairs.question: Who won the Nobel Peace Prize in 2024?
Current Affairs.explanation: The World Food Programme won the Nobel Peace Prize in 2024.

Geography.question: Which is the smallest country in the world by area?
Geography.explanation: Vatican City is the smallest country in the world by area.

Geography.question: Which mountain is the highest in Africa?
Geography.explanation: Mount Kilimanjaro is the highest mountain in Africa.

Geography.question: Which is the largest island in the world?
Geography.explanation: Greenland is the largest island in the world.

Geography.question: Which country has the longest coastline?
Geography.explanation: Canada has the longest coastline in the world.

Geography.question: What is the largest continent by area?
Geography.explanation: Asia is the largest continent by area.

Geography.question: Which river is the longest in the world?
Geography.explanation: The Nile is considered the longest river in the world.

Geography.question: Which desert is the largest in the world?
Geography.explanation: The Sahara is the largest hot desert in the world.

Geography.question: Which country has the most natural lakes?
Geography.explanation: Canada has the most natural lakes in the world.

History.question: Who was the first President of the United States?
History.explanation: George Washington was the first President of the United States.

History.question: Who led the Indian independence movement with nonviolent resistance?
History.explanation: Mahatma Gandhi led the Indian independence movement with nonviolent resistance.

History.question: Who was the first woman to win a Nobel Prize?
History.explanation: Marie Curie was the first woman to win a Nobel Prize.

History.question: Who was the first man to step on the Moon?
History.explanation: Neil Armstrong was the first man to step on the Moon in 1969.

History.question: Who was the first Emperor of China?
History.explanation: Qin Shi Huang was the first Emperor of China.

History.question: Who wrote the Indian national anthem?
History.explanation: Rabindranath Tagore wrote 'Jana Gana Mana', the Indian national anthem.

Indian Defence.question: Which Indian submarine is nuclear-powered?
Indian Defence.explanation: INS Arihant is India's first nuclear-powered submarine.

Indian Defence.question: Which Indian missile is an intercontinental ballistic missile?
Indian Defence.explanation: Agni-V is an intercontinental ballistic missile developed by India.

Indian Defence.question: Which is the largest warship in the Indian Navy?
Indian Defence.explanation: INS Vikramaditya is the largest warship in the Indian Navy.

Indian Defence.question: Which Indian missile is surface-to-air?
Indian Defence.explanation: Akash is a surface-to-air missile developed by India.

Indian Defence.question: Which Indian aircraft is known as 'Tejas'?
Indian Defence.explanation: LCA Tejas is an Indian light combat aircraft.

Indian Defence.question: Which is the oldest regiment in the Indian Army?
Indian Defence.explanation: Madras Regiment is the oldest regiment in the Indian Army.

Politics.question: Who is the current Chief Minister of West Bengal?
Politics.explanation: Mamata Banerjee is the Chief Minister of West Bengal.

Politics.question: Which Indian political party was founded by Arvind Kejriwal?
Politics.explanation: Arvind Kejriwal founded the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP).

Politics.question: Who is the current Vice President of India?
Politics.explanation: Jagdeep Dhankhar is the current Vice President of India (as of 2025).

Politics.question: Which party is currently in power in Tamil Nadu?
Politics.explanation: DMK is currently in power in Tamil Nadu.

Politics.question: Who is the current Prime Minister of India?
Politics.explanation: Narendra Modi is the current Prime Minister of India (as of 2025).

Politics.question: Which Indian state has the largest number of Lok Sabha seats?
Politics.explanation: Uttar Pradesh has the largest number of Lok Sabha seats.
